The archetype can be generated interactively

$ mvn archetype:generate \
        -DinteractiveMode=true \
        -DarchetypeGroupId=org.apache.maven.archetypes \
        -DarchetypeArtifactId=maven-archetype-beanshell-plugin \
        -DarchetypeVersion=1.1 \
        -DarchetypeRepository=https://raw.github.com/genthaler/maven-archetype-beanshell-plugin/mvn-repo

or non-interactively

$ mvn archetype:generate \
        -DinteractiveMode=false \
        -DarchetypeGroupId=org.apache.maven.archetypes \
        -DarchetypeArtifactId=maven-archetype-beanshell-plugin \
        -DarchetypeVersion=1.1 \
        -DarchetypeRepository=https://raw.github.com/genthaler/maven-archetype-beanshell-plugin/mvn-repo \
        -DgroupId=org.apache.maven.plugins \
        -DartifactId=touch-beanshell-maven-plugin \
        -Dversion=0.1-SNAPSHOT \
        -Dpackage=org.apache.maven.plugins.beanshell.touch \
        -DgoalName=touch \
        -DgoalPrefix=touch \
        -DpluginName="Beanshell Touch Maven Plugin" \
        -DpluginDescription="Maven plugin using the Beanshell Touch task to touch a given file" \
        -DparameterName=file \
        -DparameterType=java.io.File \
        -DparameterDescription="File to be touched"

Note that the property defaults of the maven-archetype-beanshell-plugin lend themselves to a plugin called touch-beanshell-maven-plugin.
